name: MeteoDance
description:
Alt Ctrl Game made during "This is not a video game" jam @LaGaitéLyrique during the 10 years weekend. It's a cooperative game about striking  simultaneously multiple symbolic pads that are displayed in space (on the board or at the ceiling) ! You have to cooperate with other, up to 8 pads at the same time ! Anyone can join and leave the game whenever them wants !

We uplodead a special build with specials hints and inputs so that you can play the game with your keyboard, but it's designed to be played with the controller you see on the pictures.

Team

  • Marine Drouin - GD - Graphic Design  - Controller Design
  • Thomatcha - GD - Game Programmer
  • Aurélien Maufroid- GD - Graphic Design  - Controller Design
  • Ophélie Cazalens - GD - Graphic Design - Controller Design
  • Exyde / Sly - GD - Game Programmer - AltCtrl Programmer
